cars.description: This is an immaculate 2016 Maserati Birdcage with only 10 miles on it. The car comes with leather seats, and feels like it  should include wings.
This is an immaculate 2014 Bugatti Veyron with only 1500 miles on it. Standard leather seats are included, and the engine is 1000 horsepower.
This is an immaculate 2015 Porsche Spyder with only 2500 miles on it. This car has Leather seats and drives like a dream.
